intro.title: About
intro.subtitle: Let me introduce myself.
intro.text:
Passionate about Tech, Product and Sports, I help teams deliver and achieve their goals.
My day-to-day:
  • Solve problems, a lot.
  • Build a roadmap and prioritize features.
  • Lead teams and give technical direction.
  • Organize delivery and set up processes.
  • Run as fast as possible and pedal as long as possible...

profile.title: Profile
profile.text: Graduated as an engineer, I have been working for 12 years closely with Tech & Product teams. My background as a developer gives me the opportunity to lead technical teams while being obsessed with product quality and user experience.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: I can take part in the setup of delivery processes, the general management of teams, the building of a roadmap or the choice of technical architecture for the product.
